person.persName: John B Auxier (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer, capt & maj 39th KY Mt Inf)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel L. Auxier and Rebecca Phillips Auxier. Married to Angelina Auxier. Father of Henrietta Auxier, Benjamin F. Auxier, Rebecca Auxier, and Maria J. Auxier. Married to Mary A. Tilsley Grayson Auxier. Stepfather of John W. Grayson. Father of Sarah C. Auxier, Samuel B. Auxier, Alvin E. Auxier, and Henry J. Auxier. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Employed Thomas Auxier as a farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Employed James Bae as a farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Served in the 39th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a captain and major from November 18, 1862, to September 15, 1865.
